scripts.build: npm run lint && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: npm run lint && npx hardhat test
scripts.coverage: npm run lint && npx hardhat coverage
scripts.deploylocaltestnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network localtestnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploytestnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network testnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploymainnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploytokensalelocaltestnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network localtestnet scripts/deployTokenSale.js
scripts.deploytokensaletestnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network testnet scripts/deployTokenSale.js
scripts.deploytokensalemainnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deployTokenSale.js
